introduction: Welcome to the Pneumatic System Laboratory

experiments.name: Select pneumatic cylinder for given load and speed requirement
Calculate load carrying capacity and speed for given pneumatic cylinder
Develop pneumatic circuit to operate direct single acting cylinder
Develop pneumatic circuit to operate direct double acting cylinder
Develop pneumatic circuit to operate indirect single acting cylinder
Develop pneumatic circuit to operate indirect double acting cylinder
Speed control of a pneumatic cylinder
Develop pneumatic circuit to transfer block from a magazine

UG: B. Tech./ B.E in Instrumentation Engineering, Industrial Instrumentation, and Mechatronics
PG: MS/Ph. D. Beginners in Instrumentation Engineering, Industrial Instrumentation, and Mechatronics

objective:
Pneumatic system has been widely used in manufacturing industry. So engineering students must get
  exposure to pneumatic system. So we are planning to develop pneumatic simulator where all
  pneumatic components will be available to students. We will be referring standard for building
  pneumatic symbols. Students must be able to design the pneumatic set up for practical application.

  These virtual laboratories allow students to learn pneumatic systems anytime and at anyplace.
  Students can select pneumatic components as if they are in a real laboratory, design the
  pneumatic circuits and test the results to practical situations. Each student has his/her own virtual
  experiment to design the pneumatic system.

courseAlignment.description: The syllabi of this lab aligns to the following universities in India.
universities: Shivaji University , Kolhapur, Degree Course Instrumentation
University of Pune, Degree course, Instrumentation & Control Engineering
National Institute of Technology Trichirappalli, Degree course Instrumentation & Control
Gujarat Technological University, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, Instrumentation & Control
Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology, B.E. (Mechatronics Engineering)
Rajasthan Technical University, B. Tech Program in Mechatronics Engineering
Manipal Academy of Higher Education, B. Tech in Mechatronics
U. P. Technical University, Luchnow, B. Tech Manufacuring Technology
